Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near 35th/Paulina
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses temp. rerouted EB: Orange Line, Archer, Ashland & 35th; WB 35th, Ashland, Robinson and Archer: due to, street blockage near 35th/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 35th/Paulina.

Eastbound buses will operate via Orange Line, Archer, Ashland and 35th.

Westbound buses will operate via 35th, Ashland, Robinson and Archer.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 69th Station
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to a sick passenger. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to a sick passenger.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus route #29 State or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
